price: 13. Ha cararina (haatan) ee dib ugu soo laabta wixii la idiinku raaxeeyey iyo guryihiinna, si wax la idiin weydiiyo5.
arabic: لَا تَرۡكُضُواْ وَٱرۡجِعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَآ أُتۡرِفۡتُمۡ فِيهِ وَمَسَٰكِنِكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُسۡـَٔلُونَ
footnotes: 5. Waxa idinku dhacay. Waxaa hadalkan loo yidhi ku digasho ahaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lā tarkuḍū wa-ir'jiʿū ilā mā ut'rif'tum fīhi wamasākinikum laʿallakum tus'alūna
